 29/***********************************************************************
 30 Overloaded Operators
 31***********************************************************************/
 32
 33/// View_promotion allows the compiler to instantiate
 34/// binary operators for views that differ in their
 35/// constness only.
 36/// A 'type' member is only provided in the special case
 37/// where the two view template parameters are identical,
 38/// and thus template parameter substitution will fail
 39/// in general. 
 40/// This ('SFINAE') principle makes the compiler consider
 41/// the binary operator template only for matching view
 42/// types.
 43template <typename LView, typename RView>
 44struct View_promotion
 45{
 46  // No 'type' member here as LView and RView are incompatible in general.
 47};
 48
 49/// Specialization for View_promotion with two identical
 50/// View class templates.
 51template <typename View>
 52struct View_promotion<View, View>
 53{
 54  typedef View type;
 55};
 56
 57/// Binary_operator_return_type encapsulates the inference
 58/// of a binary operator's return type from its arguments.
 59template <template <typename, typename> class LView,
 60 	  typename LType,
 61	  typename LBlock,
 62 	  template <typename, typename> class RView,
 63 	  typename RType,
 64	  typename RBlock,
 65          template <typename, typename> class Operator,
 66	  typename LTag = typename Is_view_type<LView<LType, LBlock> >::type,
 67	  typename RTag = typename Is_view_type<RView<RType, RBlock> >::type>
 68struct Binary_operator_return_type
 69{
 70  typedef typename Promotion<LType, RType>::type value_type;
 71
 72  typedef const expr::Binary<Operator, LBlock, RBlock, true> block_type;
 73
 74
 75  // The following projects the two view types onto their respective
 76  // const equivalent and promotes these to a return type.
 77  // Thus, Binary_operator_return_type(const_Matrix, Matrix) -> const_Matrix
 78  // but Binary_operator_return_type(Vector, Matrix) -> failure.
 79  typedef typename 
 80  View_promotion<typename ViewConversion<LView,
 81					 value_type,
 82					 block_type>::lazy_view_type,
 83		 typename ViewConversion<RView,
 84					 value_type,
 85					 block_type>::lazy_view_type>::type 
 86  view_type;
 87};
 88
 89template <template <typename, typename> class View,
 90 	  typename Type,
 91	  typename Block,
 92	  typename S>
 93inline
 94typename Binary_operator_return_type<View, Type, Block,
 95				     View, S,
 96				     expr::Scalar<View<Type, Block>::dim, S>,
 97				     expr::op::Add>::view_type
 98operator+(View<Type, Block> const& lhs, S rhs)
 99{
100  static dimension_type const dim = View<Type, Block>::dim;
101  typedef expr::Scalar<dim, S> scalar_block_type;
102  typedef Binary_operator_return_type<View, Type, Block,
103                                      View, S, scalar_block_type,
104                                      expr::op::Add>
105    type_trait;
106
107  typedef typename type_trait::block_type block_type;
108  typedef typename type_trait::view_type view_type;
109
110  return view_type(block_type(lhs.block(), scalar_block_type(rhs)));
111}
112
113template <template <typename, typename> class View,
114 	  typename Type,
115	  typename Block,
116	  typename S>
117inline
118typename Binary_operator_return_type<View, S,
119				     expr::Scalar<View<Type, Block>::dim, S>,
120				     View, Type, Block,
121				     expr::op::Add>::view_type
122operator+(S lhs, View<Type, Block> const& rhs)
123{
124  static dimension_type const dim = View<Type, Block>::dim;
125  typedef expr::Scalar<dim, S> scalar_block_type;
126  typedef Binary_operator_return_type<View, S, scalar_block_type,
127                                      View, Type, Block,
128                                      expr::op::Add> 
129    type_trait;
130
131  typedef typename type_trait::block_type block_type;
132  typedef typename type_trait::view_type view_type;
133  return view_type(block_type(scalar_block_type(lhs), rhs.block()));
134}
135
136template <template <typename, typename> class LView,
137 	  typename LType,
138	  typename LBlock,
139 	  template <typename, typename> class RView,
140 	  typename RType,
141	  typename RBlock>
142inline
143typename Binary_operator_return_type<LView, LType, LBlock,
144				     RView, RType, RBlock,
145				     expr::op::Add>::view_type
146operator+(LView<LType, LBlock> const& lhs,
147	  RView<RType, RBlock> const& rhs)
148{
149  typedef Binary_operator_return_type<LView, LType, LBlock,
150                                      RView, RType, RBlock,
151                                      expr::op::Add>
152    type_trait;
153
154  typedef typename type_trait::block_type block_type;
155  typedef typename type_trait::view_type view_type;
156  return view_type(block_type(lhs.block(), rhs.block()));
157}

159template <template <typename, typename> class View,
160 	  typename Type,
161	  typename Block,
162	  typename S>
163inline
164typename Binary_operator_return_type<View, Type, Block,
165				     View, S,
166				     expr::Scalar<View<Type, Block>::dim, S>,
167				     expr::op::Sub>::view_type
168operator-(View<Type, Block> const &lhs, S rhs)
169{
170  static dimension_type const dim = View<Type, Block>::dim;
171  typedef expr::Scalar<dim, S> scalar_block_type;
172  typedef Binary_operator_return_type<View, Type, Block,
173                                      View, S, scalar_block_type,
174                                      expr::op::Sub>
175    type_trait;
176
177  typedef typename type_trait::block_type block_type;
178  typedef typename type_trait::view_type view_type;
179
180  return view_type(block_type(lhs.block(), scalar_block_type(rhs)));
181}

189 				     expr::Scalar<View<Type, Block>::dim, S>,
190 			  	     View, Type, Block,
191				     expr::op::Sub>::view_type
192operator-(S lhs, View<Type, Block> const& rhs)

194  static dimension_type const dim = View<Type, Block>::dim;
195  typedef expr::Scalar<dim, S> scalar_block_type;
196  typedef Binary_operator_return_type<View, S, scalar_block_type,
197                                      View, Type, Block,
198                                      expr::op::Sub> 
199    type_trait;
200
201  typedef typename type_trait::block_type block_type;
202  typedef typename type_trait::view_type view_type;
203  return view_type(block_type(scalar_block_type(lhs), rhs.block()));
204}
